name: The Heart of Embu
description: Embu das Artes is a city that has never let down the "artes" in its name. It's already very beautiful and rich at its own on workdays - there're art studios, exotic stores and ethnic restaurants everywhere -, but at the weekends the amount of art and culture gets out of control as craftsmen, chefs, musicians, farmers and all kinds of artists gather from all around the state to pitch their tents at the heart of Embu and expose their 100% hand/homemade products done with local resources.
